QuestData.Title: The Field of Ferocity: Lost in the Dream!
QuestData.Description:
You know, for it being the Dragon Isles, I haven't seen too many dragons. We did get a duo of dragonkin that requested to be signed up for this competition together though.
They seem plenty eager to prove themselves though, so good luck!
QuestData.RewardText:
... Wuzzat? Is the fight over? I think I fell asleep in the middle of it for some reason.
I'm guessing you won if you're standing in front of me?
